https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aeQtvKr2iQnCmVIWtAkb1sFDtw3.jpg It is the future, the world is in ruins and a large portion of the population consists of deformed mutants living in reservations. In this world a man decides to spend his vacation visiting the ruins of a museum that is now buried under the sea. A Visitor to a Museum
